title: Ip glitch
body:
Idk if you guys have the same thing going on but whenever I purchase something from the shop it does not take ip from me and i have to relog to unglitch my ip. Like I bought 2 runes and i should only have  31 ip. My ip remained the same and after I finished 1 game, I got the first win of the day bonus and my ip was 1.1k so it clearly did not deduct the ip.


Edit 1:
Going back to the shop fixes it apparently but whenever I do that I get disconnected from the client itself.

Edit 2:
Just to avoid any misunderstanding or confusion. Even though it showed 1.1k ip on my screen, I actually could not spend the ip on something  that is less than that amount and thats because the only glitch part is the numbers that are showing but the data still registers your ip as the ORIGINAL amount that you should have.

Edit 3:
Last time I had this problem the only fix was relogging to your account but now it does not even work.
